Darius Garland had a season-high 14 assists.
Injuries for the Cavaliers: Isaac Okoro: out (shoulder).
Sam Merrill sprained his right ankle during the second quarter and did not return.
The Cavaliers wrap up their road trip at Dallas on Friday, while the Lakers host Portland on Thursday.

Injuries for the Lakers: Anthony Davis: day to day (ankle), Jarred Vanderbilt: out (knee), Gabe Vincent: day to day (oblique), Christian Wood: out (knee), Jalen Hood-Schifino: out (hamstring), LeBron James: day to day (illness).
